gaia::core::OnKeyListener Class Reference

 Called when a key is dispatched to a view.

Detailed Description

A callback to be invoked when a key event is dispatched to this widget.

The callback will be invoked before the key event is given to the widget.

 class MyKeyListener : public gaia::core::OnKeyListener {
   public:
     MyKeyListener(gaia::core::Page* page);

     bool onKey(gaia::core::Widget* w, int32_t keyCode, const gaia::core::KeyEvent& event) {
         // handle the event here...
     }
     ...
 };

 void MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const p) {
     OnKeyListener* keylistener = new MyKeyListener(this);
     mpBtn = new Button(this);
     mpBtn->setOnKeyListener(keylistener);
     ...   
 }

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool gaia::core::OnKeyListener::onKey ( Widget *  w,
int32_t  keyCode,
const KeyEvent &  event 
) [virtual]

Called when a key is dispatched to a view.

This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the target view.

Parameters:
wThe view the key has been dispatched to.
keyCodeThe code for the physical key that was pressed
eventThe KeyEvent object containing full information about the event.
Returns:
True if the listener has consumed the event, false otherwise.
